resources.string: In order to provide free enhanced customer service, DM needs to register your equipment free to the China Mobile terminal management platform.

In order to provide free enhanced customer service, which is built by China Mobile terminal management platform to realize the management of terminal such as remote terminal parameter setting and software version upgrade, DM needs to register your equipment free to the China Mobile terminal management platform. Registration will be sent through the device information messages, the message is only sent once free and will not send in Hong Kong and Macao and in international roaming state. If press Ok, it show you agree to register and use the enhanced customer service. Ohterwise if you select Cancel, China Mobile will not provide this service.
If you cancel, China Mobile will no longer provide enhanced after sale service permanent free, do you want to cancel this service?
China Mobile enhanced customer service will request application access and configure your device settings information.

China Mobile enhanced customer service will request application access and configure your device settings information, which use cellular data network. The information to be set is not involved your privacy. All the data traffic generated in the process are free. The service will not be opened in Hong Kong, Macao and in international roaming status. If you select Ok, it show you agree to access your device information and the use of mobile data network. Ohterwise if you select Cancel, China Mobile will not start the service.
If you cancel, China Mobile will not be able to set terminal parameters correctly, do you want to cancel this service?
